title: Import GNS3 appliance
description: This document assumes that you already have both the GNS3 Graphical User Interface installed (GNS3-all-in-one) and the GNS3 VM integrated with GNS3. Please refer to other guides for more details on how to install the GNS3 all-in-one package and how to download and configure the GNS3 VM.

previous.title: Install an appliance from the GNS3 Marketplace
